dialogues.text: Greetings, traveler. My name is Jora. I am the mayor of this town and ancestor of Jotar, one of the original settlers of Shamrock Town. How can I help you?

options.text: What can I do around town?

dialogues.text: You could check the Bounty Board over at the Town Square to see if you can help around. I also heard that Sebastian is looking for an experienced miner to help him locate his missing mining crew.
Oh, and currently the northern trail is closed due to brutal animal attacks. If you wish to continue your journey, I suggest you head east through the Malachite Hills.
